title: Pure Mineral - Fortifying Argan Conditioner - Hydrating & Anti-Frizz for Dry Hair - Rich in Vitamin E - Sulfate-Free, Paraben-Free, Petrolatum-Free - 500ml

features: Intense Hydration – Argan Conditioner Pure Mineral’s Argan Conditioner provides deep hydration, revitalizing dry and dull hair. Feel the difference with visibly healthier, nourished strands.
Detangling & Frizz Control Simplify your haircare routine with this detangling, frizz-reducing formula, leaving hair smooth and manageable.
Protection & Nutrition Defend your hair against daily aggressors. Enriched with argan oil and vitamin E, this conditioner nourishes and strengthens for resilient, silky hair.
Eco-Friendly Commitment Choose a haircare product that respects the environment. This conditioner is free from harmful ingredients, ensuring ethical and sustainable beauty.
Visible Results Experience Pure Mineral quality with tangible results. From the first use, hair feels softer, shinier, and full of life, proving its effectiveness.
description: Product Description Transform your hair with Pure Mineral Argan Conditioner. Enriched with argan oil and Vitamin E, this conditioner deeply hydrates, detangles, and reduces frizz. Ideal for dry hair, it nourishes intensely and protects against heat and pollutants. Results: soft, shiny, and easy-to-style hair. Ingredients WATER (AQUA), GLYCERIN, Stearyl Alcohol, CETYL ALCOHOL , Behentrimonium Chloride , AMODIMETHICONE , Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Cetyl Esters, DMDM HYDANTOIN , FRAGRANCE, Argania Spinsosa (Argan) Oil, HYDROLYZED KERATIN , Polyquaternium 10 , Phenoxyethanol (and) Ethylhexylglycerin Directions After shampooing, apply to damp hair, leave for a few minutes, and then rinse out. For dry, frizzy, or damaged hair, use more frequently as needed. Safety Warning For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Do not use if you are allergic to any of these ingredients. Discontinue use immediately if a rash or irritation occurs. See more
